commentThread.commentText: I'm am currently dealing with this. I work as a freelancer/contract basis and have more than double the experience as most in my business but have a really hard time getting work now. I'm only 48. But to them, I'm an old man. The people doing the hiring are young and they only hire the young. My work and resume speak just don't seem to matter anymore. So now I'm trying to find work outside my industry, just a normal job, to help pay the bills. But even then, I get laughed at a lot. They're like what are you doing here? They don't take me seriously. It's SO frustrating!!!

replies.commentText: LanceHenryPT it's not right but you know what, one day they will become your age and see what it's like then. I hate to say that but that's the truth. Their vision is so short sighted. The young can be dumb. It's karma for them if they don't watch out. Oh, and your FAR fro m old, let me just tell you that now.
